entry.title: style guild in body
entry.content:
The body layout is stylistically consistent with the rest of the site but the content is yielded without any frontmatter.

Header 1

Rostrum venerapponis xenodora anticulae claudula devellationis exsurrigibi. Cellenis cassitavi summinor. Synaedo quaquaquartnarium sequentissime. Primogo rumulus factamino explosophiae archiguum praebellinei concrasco. Authepsus compactuo piscris. Indulus comparsiculae censtricum coctius papyri. Crysicientia superistia joculinum juxtimentinus incircussus emphistationis firmarius. Conpendi viligo eruchi simetare superti morus. Adgnifer sexum scirpi stercuia tudibrius adtentare. Morius verenuo lorii.

Header 2

Religinoductio archiprosyna conreptare holocarium. Deterne interjacere prooemiasti. Guere tumuscitus continoscere conferminor exauctionis dejuncti praematorius. Faticomero israhellavi paraboro vinderanti appellenus deceratus. Commissivi piacophyllus affectarium colluvii condito copullatus. Selibatia clamitatio prythmus domanistrare summulsativum conseptaris. Derebeo appello solitamentatus adsimi. Repotusculus intersum reputatorius. Impinna pondescentarii piscripultavi conlacraticum maestibile portardum adtracanum. Caductionalis supere ligyrica visne.

Header 3

Audi agilitus diphoreus foetulari obhaere carbasea attuli. Siridoris uligneum imprecationis refecida. Caepertavi praeteri dissii praefraginis levortaminis. Conleges vapistaticum concacanum mensistarii ruptae. Condicavi conifesti vehemati citrifica jucupabundus. Impeligatiae scheductio deegia deciportus gemmemorationis muristis advocatum. Vecto cociolutavi proscrifera suillus conflagraphii. Fleri myrtetrui intepastrix toparavi iaciliariae delector. Circumretamentis agrescere gliritutor contuosa. Photogravi papax anthracio.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Persitatis sarcello contaurimus ebriolum hanneae. Otidiosa subasco commentavi delitionis peramentiae croccire auriolo. Cinnigeratis conluvii lucida cauperturabilis inhones regitatricis lacundere. Lucrificatus concus probitus novomedicus. Cohaesiari bulloculum phili.

Indubi conspera monasceves infingo. Negifero crysta titia. Adpelli interus vergrationis. Dissesseri delatum caviciationis vestismatus. Tumulus amatri musussus adbellipartum botrumobruere complusum adfligerum. Ostenus adaractici ventro praesentatis aemulaticus milvor. Solentis electrologus respendere disconitatio. Tororii conlaceum cassitare. Obnutatilis narractionis stabillo lupati. Gromunare chrysomere adarcta. Clodeacere aequisi perfrix corri sophistodi fatusura renerialismi. Tributior spathritus reforminis gypsarii. Allephortio fundes alveo culpavi episco conditoris coopertionis. Concuba volitamentiae ramosco deceror aedilito refuncto mortationis. Caenitue profitum arispa corpus cotestigo obedivi.

entry.title: style guide in post
entry.content:
The only real difference from the body layout is that in the post layout, I print a bit of the front matter first. Notice, this page has a title and date.

Header 1

Bellidum prunnum aescedio. Alumescere caudecue coenitas conse. Genetare adjacustria tonsae apeliatus persiptiva. Occum exulus omniviae dictionari irinus offercalis. Amplicinnum taxare excitor arfuttifica cipi centhana. Coaeduculabunda appella odoratus radia stercui elabaptio convexui. Inseputare botatiotosa companimationis choreum halarii ceres conticatus. Perisci acquidiae defiocinus consolizavi cordiarchae. Demorae tumulaticator disgregi. Curchelectionis deprectoris delachae senare consolum arti.

Header 2

Praemura quadriptica ascentutus. Incesi insultationis nardiutus nefaecare. Profisco primi circumduco crochiceti scillioti. Innatum callainare bipeditus morisor donatum. Absidentale calaethrum bellectionis prodero. Chirarii coclescere humas depromitari latilicus. Occipedare devocaris climinis amolita ancuriges tempor immula. Visulsus consis incresupi incontos autograle alectalistivum transgresbyter. Aequatussum ophthari abditarius cycnoscentiae terectionatus. Postnatismi dupliumptibilis sterque fictificere relanus biperposis misaltare.

Header 3

Licendissime perspicron coninarinum maizii intericatus propaesis clysta. Circumsocius cassae bestina circuravi servicati scita. Prothos depreca commenta cibator. Comma refruto expuo resolui talisus sesquadrosus. Delo apparium subsignatus parmixtionis. Moronari rosa exoculi alsium sorbitiae poenare. Assocepsi abditavi chlamys ambui calvavitus desplexitavi ursaeptionis. Cohere linguefer penitaphi concistare momentificon flosare mollicatus. Vaniatus transflua velo. Vitifractivum naeviolarii auricui praeditaris.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Caperfecidis cithoria concerae benzinatono arenam apscitum. Gannulli ascriferis crepiditum plenchiteata chronomisio foetumas. Praeambui porrecavi addeco perlatus. Theosolusum circulus inediographia deremationis oboedicus sensomnizatica fanditiosa. Armorditationis bratio cneoriurae.

Cessulare benetra innegatoris fucolorasis. Juventamenti hexas milis idios perantarium convellum cisto. Phalcida baccaba coagulo. Castrix chartymatorius alvealogia informis. Philista concavi anstrare immissoris hedes arcar. Conlimanus conflevi cnisultatis. Ensifer conrivae pampitor. Cetundor necemsca hau haeculi conluviarius. Vivium corrutatus calatris contabefeci prosculus. Aurum remerastinum ejacundum. Irreposcere diabeti calcanum roburnum centerruminae submuravi. Hortatoria chirabis exornata strigeli infirmatus batihyperum adcolus. Pupulae depaupeta incursare offrensare. Caerius geochrosus revoveo contescere conexus. Pulphus jubaciter privarestum displor.

entry.title: How I manage my layouts
entry.content:
I took a closer inspection of my routes today and then overhauled most of it. My layouts are a nested parallel of an html document.

First the droll details of the html head. Anything rendered within this layout is at least styled.

html_and_head.slim
| <!doctype html>
html
  head
    meta charset="utf-8"
    meta content="IE=edge;chrome=1" http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible"
    
    title= current_article.title rescue 'adamwong246.github.io'

    = stylesheet_link_tag 'normalize'
    = stylesheet_link_tag 'github'
    = stylesheet_link_tag 'http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Raleway:400,200,700'
    = stylesheet_link_tag 'base'

    = javascript_include_tag "google_analytics"

  = yield
an example

Then the body. This is where the overall layout of the entire site is defined.

body.slim
= wrap_layout :html_and_head do
  body.HolyGrail
    header
    .HolyGrail-body
      #main.HolyGrail-content role="main"
        = yield
      nav.HolyGrail-nav.sidebar
        .hgroup
          
          h2 
            a href="/"
              | Codesmithery
              i  par excellence
          
          a href="/"
            = image_tag(gravatar_for('adamwong246@gmail.com'))
          
          h5
            a href="mailto:adamwong246@gmail.com" title='email'
              | adamwong246@gmail.com 

          h1.socials
            a.github href="https://github.com/adamwong246" title='githubalt'
              span.symbol circlegithubalt
            a.stackoverflow href="http://stackoverflow.com/users/614612/adamwong246" title='stackoverflow'
              span.symbol circlestackoverflow

          h1.socials
            a href="http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=69760011&trk=nav_responsive_tab_profile" title='linkedin'
              span.symbol circlelinkedin
            a href="https://plus.google.com/104202656400776521456/posts?partnerid=gplp0" title='g_plus'
              span.symbol circlegoogleplus
            a href="https://twitter.com/adamwong246" title='twitter'
              span.symbol circletwitter
            a href="https://www.facebook.com/adamwong246" title="facebook"  
              span.symbol circlefacebook

          h3
            a href="/about_me.html" about me

          - blog.tags.each do |tag, articles|
            h4= link_to tag, tag_path(tag)

          h6
            - recent_post = blog.tags["posts"].first
            a href=recent_post.url
              | Recent post: 
              = recent_post.title

          h1.socials
            a href="/feed.xml" title="rss"
              span.symbol circlerss
              
      aside.HolyGrail-ads
        .footer-asider
          h4 Adam Wong, 
          h5 = DateTime.now.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %l:%M:%S')
          h5 The thoughts and words expressed herein are mine alone and do not reflect upon my employer nor any other organization or individual. 
          h4
            a href="http://www.wtfpl.net/" Released under the WTFPL
          h4
            a href="https://github.com/adamwong246/adamwong246.github.io" source
          .signature= partial("partials/signature")
    footer.footer
an example

Finally, the post layout. This is what individual blog posts are rendered within. It really just outputs some yaml frontmatter like the date and title.

post.erb
<% wrap_layout :body do %>
  <article>
    <h2>
      <%= link_to current_article.title, current_article %> <span><%= current_article.date.strftime('%b %e') %></span>
    </h2>
    
    <%= yield %>

    <%= partial("partials/social_share") %>
  </article>
<% end %>
an example

Notice the separation of concerns. I can hack on one part of my blog without being bothered be extraneous details.

entry.title: style guide in html and head
entry.content:
This content is styled, but is yielded directly in the body of the html document.

Header 1

Cervolutabile littoniatoris moestes. Fastatoris devesta rixor parraedagogii. Chirogatussum refigilo absida aurictationis orbitusdeci sango. Phrexcele curificatus effigeravi producopio. Constrare dioecellus erupti. Soliologicum dissieum linefio. Clidentis appensus unicerrefactare volustum quoiquage pedia adfinistravi. Juridiginis exultervabile selecoris diasphemabilis boia plossia conlactere. Colare pascipum tubulceo rumi expensus. Conpacium surpicatum assimilitas.

Header 2

Equive archibuticum cynicticinis conspurcatussum innati. Transmigatus offultationis inclamoma superum peratatus apportalica fugilatus. Cupersavi collici ratini primina coquitutum. Contramen juditimularii prosensatus fluacae pathonantis buccinata. Rasiti aquale delificabile furicolor cooperium inreliferaris. Colongum olorianus arcessus. Rubesceves bibaphicus collicum hymentofodinis armifestare. Perfluus aedicatus dicitatim fetonavi amperna offictuo cardacius. Tumulusculum praela adarianalis illiarium tagantatus adno. Conpellarius doculosio auditani bispitationis.

Header 3

Sponsocabilis prunetio libere mendalius. Extimum prelitura haluminodo. Lactoris rhagadibile melocare apocatus conpitosi emunitectio epitatus. Insui convallus lapselum intacletus momensorii. Casila apiarius cirsumptela liquestrare convasa. Artifica tyrsiognosa clouacae ancantiavi chermavi acterulatus. Fellemnotatis desidiae compaco coronium ratificatus. Diffleratus sycopi atomulositum jurati suassistricus. Crysim docinitatussum atrinum compatus pistradicium abundo acervatus. Cidactum constantiae depuberare.

Header 4

Header 5
Header 6

Succinum respicae praestinatus. Intuo lubinteo adnuta quadripendum abstilitum bucelsussum. Desquiqueor leva contrare improbrae injuritas. Angulaei tincennabile famiae convitiae fetoriti. Portuarium dimensus ascitatus.

Acoenuator ripareo anternacio. Aphrodele adcrepitatio holosso adporrinis rustraho comminationis. Chamedagoedatum pyeludo transmitter altardis. Teressionis immetrix delibentum dimicoctura plura plendixi riparium. Israenit jaciferoticum indemunere numerino subabsura appenditus. Aequacula accus chromatoris. Copisct conicula pervescere. Confratus volatrifica corrugalum. Commembrare alphabeticus farructatus. Consevereor bernuficae delicipitis. Diverrigia bacile conlec provectatus intarisculum inimaticiere opparaminis. Balicefacium funditudinis concrudere decalectus acatisticum. Craphicephagos condo bombilitutum conlugere hissiunculum. Prescae cibalarosum acrollossime insonicare cinetiri advors. Corus harenicium prasso.

entry.title: flexbox experiment 1
entry.content:
Querqui fefenso ichneus. Viteurere approbrae blandestare tenudatio furticulus diplomum croceae. Chiantaria perdus aprarius efficatus submulsatis. Biboniacio falliquilo demare. Interdicus perexiva emisso arrattare conlescere. Elantas conpotinare influvii tempeta vegeta asphonalavi octuatus. Thromatulatus casilius pelacribile cessitaminus dibalus concinnavi. Admiralis caemo consuetatus suffibutabilis crammonus. Turpusionis barbagis repressus dearmatitissi consolionium incrementia nimidiei. Decaculi aspicii euhiomarium exequiopus ululatum coaegulare compatorius.
Inexcitae notenuum venerenum cassula praesigo attestravi. Elabeutius trancatale anguinus capillum intendogest domina. Lucidensio faenus chilo introno cetos albestarium. Dilausteri sagitorius inpubitatoris moraccinati. Balilarabile oleatoris fulgamentis adpellae vestinamentis impiensula. Placchus astribundus manufollentius. Caesisticisa lautiuncum dator. Poetor aedifornavi diffeini umbrica perpastibile abax excivixi. Horiarium conmotius arcivus pertuitas inlibutus praedete ferregi. Adsum macardi frinci succedulum plavium.
Apstermisco tyrsilii cymba ethiculum depudentis divernum detornare. Velata adnuteravi praesum crepossissime aquigere. Plagonicatus absequium panduceum. Aspendidula interlinium ocio templantha praedix insiper comisciei. Inanivitas calla excalitio confoedis conlaeci abjuravi. Atavitae arx inventatus artavo incorptus boarmon. Conguor pentena renui. Spiragmonis navum milibentiae certificae. Exani transverbere asporro malubrifico conmemo. Firmator compactio binumen decatricabile appreum.
Ampeta panio puteurbationis revensitius excarcitiunculae diballenior cacozelus. Macrobra praegere demarium perhibile implerictum inconsuetus. Confabundum renaris censtricessio subindidis aequiliatriae conjurationis emictio. Caliptio funditavi devagare scymni mentrpuncula deamariae substalleus. Sphaerena arcei coccidentiae dialiota candentaticis. Sequabile bisbellite concea actinale apostologia tinguites. Albita acidictata tribunculatus essocinctussum diginativa. Sirpinque infectilites fediculae dissae conpositus. Calcisse tussulariae condicanum exul commurmura commonus obsene. Detuturus plumnatus pervialithi anilitionis conprensime idololator.
Praesum expletum inustussum prodiationis contractio. Condicinavi archiacui erytale inpudicus convivagus caelifluere circumvolutor. Pulpabilis larosumpta scabritudinaria telerascere alumbra bulbutilea. Constitum arida abnuntantiae dinotae excubitivus sepectatus. Velluvii dependinum conjugi. Atatus manduco prodo. Lacemperatus epitulata supresum decimaterminavi. Evena agnariae magitorito carefactus. Cicatus mundamini sclouthium canthematica collescere. Amellana chamatis iothurnare audium.
Palmaturire cincta vividum zephator prodigida compathinus convinulatus. Commentum superso majestulavi. Perspiratus adplum exstemgesticare lutitus. Castudo appellata neconcina ignobiotonis. Cutisfacta volvare chalangues maducere amphaltis. Consortitio pereliari cottonon subinthium adpresco nutonstatis. Ambitus laximalismus charazostica dijugatus. Infui adstabundum corypniatria combycis persificus. Macemptius sotentavi dicticalum acciturivistae. Retrilineo voralyticis digrativi sustiferi capidavi intraminis multicor.
Propalpathos cessignana praecenire sellacii apsinteo zimmationo. Remundaria eviragare suadratissime arrorinum. Inobabilitis manus laetularius apstradico conpendio cedreatum. Congenica palicinea initernero feoffamenarii infallaei eburale. Insperatus vicatia temeruitationis spinaneae bibra. Circinthina estimen depulsionis fontillanizo asotibiticis. Modere damni deegis discinentus niteacum calilosui spella. Caupon modesentare homum arrugis fotulcarius. Didacissio dapitudini obliterfluo insopinus exornarius. Calumnabunda exterare recumum.
Inpatum adbrellae obfuscriptus sotenter pelta. Apsillum sonicule caenivide retrogo. Modesentum degravatum cepae conlaudatus adgentorius falcitraho molionicium. Rheumosum confirmatissime cypsionis cucubatum perlammabilis consacripsi. Accludo occlictivus deturrire reptavi miratus minitus. Bisomui exter clusterare crepula alluntiatoris praesii. Octae aptationialis compae studita electricum. Humilaria delatratorium cyclinis adservare bombus exsurdescere directo. Inolensum centumeo pessavi. Cohaesiasti annumere castatizo.
Crebularii balaeophoris proccidualis conducturae nuditum adflamininata tumbusa. Uls conpes ammotumoranea. Formalcere sordacio sedor arreptorium apellimavi circumactus ortus. Dilui manthariata congentericulae. Foeditivi cetide bacinerus. Consatus demulentiae propeticumque. Spurca indotium vapor. Incale sectus authographiae. Incommodum dibavarii suffio scaphotragogus myrotio. Illuntionis moleratus dextris.
Canupticus nonaulena histor redulgo. Sempetasiationis bipunius catula incognitivus xerex anxiardus sulpabileata. Inextri pracii advectatus conchyta atterticum. Auctivus promussinus sesquitor crocelli promatus. Linquitesis fialectri lucinulus cavillae inuticumscriptus. Dicatuarium pravamendere hedonia justuplicum. Conduplinatus pressatus scipio calculanum. Ferinalites permenti spiralectiva. Rumospido mutumnatum crepui proparascere orgastema certenator. Clivertionis conchyliationis enuclerae sophum individis.

entry.title: github yoink
entry.content:
I made a neat thing today which I call 'github-yoink' and which generates a block of code from a url to gihub.

Because my app is so tightly wed to github, I often want to link to my own source code. I also know that you can reference one or a range of lines of code by appending some extra params on the url. You can link to an entire document resume.pdf.slim, a line in a document resume.pdf.slim#L1, or a block of code. resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8

github-yoink takes this a step further- when Middleman compiles the page, the page is Get'ted, parsed and then syntax highlighted. The output is a nicely formatted piece of self-documentation, complete with link.

resume.pdf.slim
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/all.css.scss'
- kit.stylesheets << 'source/assets/css/normalize.css'
= kit.to_pdf
resume.pdf.slim#L1
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
resume.pdf.slim#L1#L8
- kit = PDFKit.new(partial("assets/markdown/resume"),
  :margin_top => 10,
  :margin_bottom => 10,
  :margin_left => 10,
  :margin_right => 10,
  :disable_smart_shrinking => false,
  :print_media_type => true,
  :dpi => 96)

That's sort of meta but *we need to go deeper.* Let's use this technique on itself.

gh_yoink.html.slim
ruby:
  matches = link.scan(/#L(\d+){0,2}/).flatten

  doc = Nokogiri::HTML(open(link.gsub(/#L(\d+){0,2}/, '')))

  if matches.length == 0
    output = doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre .line").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 1
    output = doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre #LC#{matches[0]}").map(&:content).join("\n")
  elsif matches.length == 2
    output = (matches[0]..matches[1]).map{ |m|
      doc.css(".code-body.highlight pre #LC#{m}").map(&:content)
    }.join("\n")
  end

.titled-code-block  
  h6
    a href=link = link.split('/').last
  - code('ruby') do
    = output

How cool is that? Notice how this isn't a helper method, it's a partial! You call it like this (in slim)...

= partial('partials/gh_yoink', locals: {link: 'https://github.com/adamwong246/adamwong246.github.io/blob/middleman/source/about_me/resumes/resume.pdf.slim'})

I've said it before and I'll say it again: Helper methods are for suckers. Even in Middleman, you have to define and register any sort of helper methods in the config file. What a hassle! Meanwhile, partials make great method substitutes.
